TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SoapMessage extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示特定 的 SOAP 请求或 SOAP 响应中的数据。

span.span: Represents the data in a SOAP request or SOAP response at a specific .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要用途类是用于 SOAP 扩展，它表示 SOAP 请求或 SOAP 响应中的数据。The primary use of the class is for SOAP extensions, representing the data in a SOAP request or SOAP response. 当调用方法时，接收在每个。When the method is called, a receives a at each . 由特定的 SOAP 扩展，选择如何处理。It is up to the particular SOAP extension to choose how to process the . 常见的 SOAP 扩展插件包括加密和压缩。Common SOAP extensions include encryption and compression. SOAP 扩展可以应用到任何一个或两个 XML Web 服务方法创建使用 ASP.NET 或 XML Web 服务客户端。SOAP extensions can be applied to either or both an XML Web service method created using ASP.NET or an XML Web service client. 当 SOAP 扩展应用于 XML Web 服务方法，方法接收的实例，它派生。When a SOAP extension is applied to an XML Web service method, the method receives an instance of , which derives from . 同样，SOAP 扩展应用于 XML Web 服务客户端，当接收的实例。Likewise, when a SOAP extension is applied to an XML Web service client, receives an instance of . ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapMessage#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessage/CPP/SoapMessage.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapMessage#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessage/CS/soapmessage.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapMessage#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessage/VB/soapmessage.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks SOAP 扩展可以设置属性以提供有关编码的 SOAP 消息而无需更改的媒体类型，如中所表示的补充信息`Content-Type`HTTP 标头。A SOAP extension can set the property to provide supplementary information about the encoding of a SOAP message without changing the media type as expressed in the `Content-Type` HTTP header.

summary.span: 当在派生类中被重写时，断言当前 为可以使用 in 参数的阶段。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, asserts that the current is a stage where in parameters are available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 断言的阶段是不同的 XML Web 服务客户端和 XML Web 服务方法。The asserted stage is different for XML Web service clients and XML Web service methods. SOAP 请求进行反序列化后，XML Web 服务方法的参数中将使用阶段。An XML Web service method's in parameters are available after the SOAP request is deserialized in the stage. XML Web 服务客户端中的参数可在 SOAP 请求序列化过程中之前阶段。For an XML Web service client, the in parameters are available prior to the SOAP request serialization process in the stage. 可以调用任何，但是时会引发参数不可用。 can be called during any , however an is thrown when in parameters are not available.

span.span: In parameters are not available.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void EnsureOutStage() cil managed

summary.span: 当在派生类中被重写时，断言当前 阶段是不可以使用 out 参数的阶段。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, asserts that the current stage is a stage where out parameters are available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 断言的阶段是不同的 XML Web 服务客户端和 XML Web 服务方法。The asserted stage is different for XML Web service clients and XML Web service methods. XML Web 服务方法的 out 参数不可在 SOAP 响应序列化过程中之前阶段。An XML Web service method's out parameters are available prior to the SOAP response serialization process in the stage. 在 XML Web 服务客户端的 out 参数可用于在 SOAP 响应反序列化过程完成后阶段。In an XML Web service client, the out parameters are available after the SOAP response deserialization process in the stage. 可以调用任何，但是时会引发参数不可用。 can be called during any , however an is thrown when out parameters are not available.

span.span: Out parameters are not available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过执行位或运算的多个实例上添加多个阶段类。Multiple stages can be asserted by performing a bitwise OR operation on multiple instances of the class. 可以调用任何。 can be called during any . ## Examples 下面的示例断言当前可以是或; 如果不是，将引发异常。The following example asserts that the current is either or ; if it is not, an exception is thrown. remarks.format: ## Remarks SOAP 标头是 SOAP 请求或 SOAP 响应的一个可选部分。SOAP headers are an optional portion of a SOAP request or SOAP response. 使用 ASP.NET 和其客户端创建的 XML Web services 中使用 SOAP 标头的详细信息，请参阅类。For more details on using SOAP headers in XML Web services created using ASP.NET and their clients, see the class. 尽管属性可以访问在任何阶段，仅会使用 SOAP 标头信息中填充和阶段。Although the property can be accessed at any stage, it is only populated with the SOAP header information in the and stages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 检查表示 SOAP 请求或 SOAP 响应，例如日志记录 SOAP 扩展的数据的 SOAP 扩展可以使用`Stream`属性可用于查看数据，每个。SOAP extensions that inspect the data representing a SOAP request or SOAP response, such as a logging SOAP extension, can use the `Stream` property to view the data at each . 修改表示 SOAP 请求或 SOAP 响应，例如加密或压缩 SOAP 扩展的数据的 SOAP 扩展应执行此操作与传递到方法的。SOAP extensions that modify the data representing a SOAP request or SOAP response, such as encryption or compression SOAP extensions, should do so with the passed into the method of . 的属性传递到是只读的。The property of passed into is read-only. 有关修改表示 SOAP 请求或 SOAP 响应的数据的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on modifying the data representing a SOAP request or SOAP response, see . ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapMessage_Headers#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessage_Headers/CPP/SoapMessage_Headers.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[SoapMessage_Headers#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessage_Headers/CS/soapmessage_headers.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SoapMessage_Headers#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessage_Headers/VB/soapmessage_headers.vb#2)]
